about_me.des: I am a data scientist with a strong background in mathematics. Through academic and profesionnal projects, I gained significant data mining, machine learning, deep learning, and coding experience. Life is a continuous learning process, so work makes me more rigorous, musics makes my life more colorful.

projects.CD4: Research on a new method to modelize the cell cycle of lymphocyte CD4 (white blood cells), (n in each generation, death/proliferation rate,...) | #Matlab
projects.d3js: Visualizations on french assembly bipartism , flu evolution, and football odds comparator. | #html #css #javascript #d3js
projects.kaggle: A well known data science competition hosting real world machine-learning problems.
projects.Oil: Determine the quality of several wells of a Canadian oil field with their production curves per month. | #R #Python
projects.geoloc: Implementation of an indoor geolocation algorithm for Roxhwale and analysis of customers' paths.| #Matlab #R #Python
projects.velov: Determining the evolution of the city's (velo'v) bicycle fleet and provide statistics and graphical information for each station. #kafka #spark
projects.deep_learning: Geofrey Hinton's dicsiple :), Diving into restricted boltzmann machine recurrent neural network, learning

career.Eligo_des: Working with awesome geneticists phd's to help them decipher genomic data.
career.master2_des: I chose a specialization in Data Science shared between Mathematics and Computer Science section of the University Lyon 1.
career.master2_job: Master Data Science | Universit√© Claude Bernard Lyon 1 (UCBL) - Ecole Centrale - Liris | Lyon
career.master2_course1: Statistical methods and Regression Models, Probabilistic Graphical Models, Graph Complexity and Combinatory, Data Visualization, Cloud Computing, Data Mining, Big Data Analytics, Machine learning
career.internship_des: At Roxwhale, I developped a geolocation algorithm using ibeacon technology. I learned Python and specialized in probabilistic graphical models.
career.internship_course1: Optimization, Signal Treatment, Statistical Modeling, Hidden Markov Models, Markov Random Fields, Machine learning
career.master1_des: In December 2015, I completed my first year of master and followed the machine learning course from Stanford University (Andrew Ng).
career.master1_job: Master in Statistics, Computer Science, and Numerical Analysis | UCBL | Lyon
career.master1_course1: Numerical Analysis, Probabilities, Parametric Statistics, Time Series, Dynamical Systems, Stochastic Processes
career.bachelor_des: At December 2014, I obtained my bachelor in mathematics and started my master.
